name: STRIKER of SKY
description:
Multi-play using VR devices

- Drone soccer official game rules and actual measurement-based stadiums and
play environments Implemented to provide an experience similar to playing in the field.

Customizable characters, drones and stadium environment reflecting local characteristics

- You can decorate your own character and drone,
You can play in stadiums decorated with city concepts of Seoul, Daejeon, and Jeonju city.

Supports various controllers when flying drones

- When controlling the flight of the drone, not only the VR controller,
but also the keyboard, gamepad and Frsky flight controller You can operate your drone.
